template.title: One_column Body with Contents on left
template.description: Create a page with one-column body with contents listed on the left.

template.title: One_column Body with Contents on right
template.description: Create a page with one-column body with contents listed on the right.

template.title: One_column Body with Contents on left with non-editable regions
